sentences.sContent: Invert the cake onto a serving plate.
sentences.sCn: 把蛋糕倒扣过来放到一个盘子上。

synos.tran: 使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置

words.tran: 换流器，[电子] 反相器；倒转者
颠倒（invert的过去分词）；使…反向

trans.tranCn: 使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置
trans.tranOther: to put something in the opposite position to the one it was in before, especially by turning it upside down (= the bottom is on the top and the top is on the bottom )

trans.tranCn: 颠倒的事物；倒置物；倒悬者
